controls.title: Identity and Access Management
controls.description: Implement proper identity and access management controls for Kinesis Data Streams access

implementation.description: Configure IAM policies with least privilege access using specific Kinesis actions and resource ARNs in CloudFormation/Terraform templates

controls.title: Data Security and Information Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Ensure data encryption at rest and in transit for streaming data

implementation.description: Enable server-side encryption using AWS KMS keys and enforce HTTPS/TLS for data producers and consumers

controls.title: Data Classification
controls.description: Classify and tag streaming data based on sensitivity levels

implementation.description: Implement data classification tags on Kinesis streams and establish data handling procedures based on classification

controls.title: Audit Logging and Monitoring
controls.description: Enable comprehensive logging and monitoring of Kinesis Data Streams activities

implementation.description: Configure CloudTrail, CloudWatch metrics, and VPC Flow Logs for comprehensive monitoring of stream access and operations

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to Kinesis streams

implementation.description: Implement resource-based policies and IAM roles with condition statements to control access to specific streams and operations

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information

implementation.description: AWS provides TLS encryption for data in transit by default; ensure client applications use HTTPS endpoints

controls.title: Protection of Information at Rest
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of information at rest

implementation.description: Configure server-side encryption with customer-managed KMS keys for data at rest in Kinesis streams

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Ensure auditable events are defined and logging is configured

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail logging for all Kinesis API calls and configure CloudWatch for operational metrics

controls.title: Information System Backup
controls.description: Conduct backups of user-level information contained in the information system

implementation.description: Implement application-level data archival to S3 or other durable storage for critical streaming data

controls.title: Information System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor the information system to detect attacks and indicators of potential attacks

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch alarms for anomalous activity, failed API calls, and unusual data patterns in streams

controls.title: Kinesis Data Streams should be encrypted at rest
controls.description: Kinesis Data Streams should have server-side encryption enabled

implementation.description: Enable server-side encryption using AWS managed keys or customer managed KMS keys in stream configuration

controls.title: IAM policies should not allow full administrative privileges
controls.description: Avoid overly permissive IAM policies for Kinesis access

implementation.description: Create specific IAM policies with minimal required permissions for Kinesis operations, avoiding wildcard permissions

controls.title: CloudTrail should be enabled and configured with at least one multi-Region trail
controls.description: Enable CloudTrail to log Kinesis API activities across regions

implementation.description: Ensure CloudTrail is enabled at the account level to capture all Kinesis API calls and management events

controls.title: CloudWatch should be configured to monitor Kinesis streams
controls.description: Monitor Kinesis streams performance and security metrics

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch dashboards and alarms for key Kinesis metrics including throughput, errors, and iterator age

controls.title: Kinesis Data Streams should be encrypted at rest with AWS KMS
controls.description: Ensure Kinesis streams are encrypted using AWS KMS for data protection

implementation.description: Configure StreamEncryption property with KMS key ARN in infrastructure templates

controls.title: VPC endpoints should be used for Kinesis access from private subnets
controls.description: Use VPC endpoints to access Kinesis without internet gateway

implementation.description: Create VPC endpoints for Kinesis service and configure route tables to use private connectivity

controls.title: Cross-account access should use roles not users
controls.description: Use IAM roles for cross-account Kinesis access instead of IAM users

implementation.description: Create cross-account IAM roles with trust policies for external account access to Kinesis streams

controls.title: API logging should be enabled for security monitoring
controls.description: Enable comprehensive API logging for security analysis

implementation.description: Ensure CloudTrail data events are enabled for Kinesis streams to capture detailed API activity

cost.name: AWS Kinesis Data Streams Cost Optimization

controls.title: Right-size shard capacity
controls.description: Monitor and adjust the number of shards based on actual throughput requirements

implementation.description: Use CloudWatch metrics to monitor IncomingRecords, OutgoingRecords, and IteratorAgeMilliseconds to determine optimal shard count and implement auto-scaling policies

controls.title: Optimize data retention period
controls.description: Set appropriate retention periods to balance operational needs with storage costs

implementation.description: Configure RetentionPeriodHours parameter based on business requirements, default is 24 hours but can be extended up to 365 days

controls.title: Use on-demand capacity mode judiciously
controls.description: Evaluate on-demand vs provisioned capacity modes based on usage patterns

implementation.description: Use on-demand mode for unpredictable workloads and provisioned mode for steady, predictable traffic to optimize costs

controls.title: Implement efficient consumer patterns
controls.description: Optimize consumer applications to reduce unnecessary API calls and data transfer

implementation.description: Use enhanced fan-out for multiple consumers, implement proper checkpointing, and batch record processing to reduce costs

controls.title: Monitor and alert on cost metrics
controls.description: Set up cost monitoring and budgets for Kinesis usage

implementation.description: Configure AWS Budgets and Cost Explorer alerts for Kinesis spend, and use cost allocation tags for tracking

controls.title: Optimize cross-region data transfer
controls.description: Minimize cross-region data transfer costs by co-locating resources

implementation.description: Deploy Kinesis streams, producers, and consumers in the same AWS region when possible to avoid data transfer charges

controls.title: Archive historical data efficiently
controls.description: Use cost-effective storage for long-term data archival instead of extended retention

implementation.description: Implement Kinesis Data Firehose or custom consumers to archive data to S3 with appropriate storage classes for long-term retention
